content: pattern crochet сat moore by nataliia romaniv @natty toys 2 hello i m inviting you to the fairy-tale world of amigurumi if you bought this pattern you are ready to dream and create you will definitely be able to crochet a toy that will please you and your loved ones good luck and inspiration for creativity the pattern is for personal use only sharing information copy resold and distribute this pattern is prohibited don t translate on other languages with the toy made of this pattern you can do what you want give or sell when you will posting a photo of your toy on instagram or other social media be sure to mention @natty toys as designer link our shop https //www etsy com/shop/nattytoys thanks for understanding have a nice job 3 materials for a cat color a - plush yarn of himalaya dolphin baby №80333 1 skein 120m 131yd - 100g plastic eyes 2 pieces sewing threads for sewing parts black threads for embroidering of the muzzle fiberfill for filling toys 100g for shirt color b - yarn for knitting the shirt gazzal baby cotton brown color №117 160m 175 yd - 50g 2 small button tools 4 mm crochet hook knitting needle 3 5 mm large needle for sewing the parts of the toy knitting markers to mark the beginning of a row abbreviations crochet r row don t use a round work in a continuous spiral without slip stitches unless otherwise stated single_crochet - single_crochet increase single_crochet increase 2 single crochets in one stitch decrease single_crochet decrease single_crochet 2 stitches together knitting edge st - edge stitch magic_ring amigurumi ring how make magic_ring you can see by the link https //www youtube com/watch v=cuen7dsphw0 sts - stitches p - purl stitch k - knit stitch yo yarn over yokyo - yarn over 1 knit stitch yarn over k2tog - knit next 2 stitches together crochet pattern using the yarn of color a crochet hook 4 mm the head with the body are crocheting as one piece after that to sew the arms ears and tail head place a marker at the beginning of the round r 1 magic_ring 7 r 2 increase *7 14 r 3 increase *14 28 r 4 3sc increase *7 35 4 r 5 4sc increase *7 42 r 6 5sc ins *7 49 r 7-11 49 single_crochet 5 rounds r 12 5sc decrease *7 42 r 13 4sc decrease *7 35 r 14 3sc decrease *7 28 r 15 decrease *14 14 continue to crochet the body r 16 1sc increase *7 21 r 17 single_crochet 21 r 18 2sc increase *7 28 r 19 single_crochet 28 r 20 3sc increase *7 35 r 21 single_crochet 35 r 22 4sc increase *7 42 r 23 single_crochet 42 r 24 5sc increase *7 49 r 25-29 49 single_crochet 5 rounds r 30 decrease 3sc decrease 2sc decrease 14sc decrease 6sc decrease 14sc 44 r 31 single_crochet 44 r 32 decrease 4sc decrease
